meanings.definition: A type of flowering plant commonly found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent1: The lantana in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of lantana flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the lantana, enjoying its nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a field of lantana, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The scent of lantana filled the air, creating a tropical paradise.

meanings.definition: The bright, colorful flowers of the lantana plant.
meanings.sent1: She picked a bouquet of lantana for the table centerpiece.
meanings.sent2: The lantana blossoms added a pop of color to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the lantana bushes.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as a cluster of lantana blooms.
meanings.sent5: The lantana petals danced in the breeze, like tiny bursts of sunshine.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the verbena family.
meanings.sent1: The lantana genus includes many species with unique characteristics.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the different varieties of lantana plants.
meanings.sent3: The lantana family reunion was a blooming success.
meanings.sent4: In the garden, the lantana stood out among the other flowers.
meanings.sent5: The lantana leaves rustled in the wind, whispering secrets of the verbena family.
